title: Europeâ€™s extreme caution on NGTs is deepening distrust, not rebuilding it
summary_full: Excessive caution towards new genomic techniques reinforces the idea that biotechnology is fundamentally dangerous unless tightly contained. Instead of normalising innovation, the EU risks entrenching GM stigma
summary_public: Excessive caution towards new genomic techniques reinforces the idea that biotechnology is fundamentally dangerous unless tightly contained. Instead of normalising innovation, the EU risks entrenching GM stigma
